CustomField.description: Indicates whether the easy entry popup appears on the Time Entry page when you double-click an editable hour cell on a timecard row or press the DOWN ARROW key while that cell is selected.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether the easy entry popup appears on the Time Entry page when you double-click an editable hour cell on a timecard row or press the DOWN ARROW key while that cell is selected.
CustomField.label: Show Easy Entry Popup
